meanings.sent1: The fecht between the two knights was fierce.
meanings.sent2: The soldiers prepared for the fecht against the enemy.
meanings.sent3: The fecht between the cat and the mouse was quite entertaining.
meanings.sent4: The fecht for survival in the jungle is relentless.
meanings.sent5: The fecht for justice never ends.

meanings.definition: To fight or engage in battle.
meanings.sent1: The warriors fecht bravely on the battlefield.
meanings.sent2: They fecht against tyranny and oppression.
meanings.sent3: I will fecht you for the last piece of cake!
meanings.sent4: She had to fecht her inner demons to find peace.
meanings.sent5: He fechts with all his might to protect his loved ones.
